attributes.action: remove Chancellor Darling from his post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Incompetence in office (Northern Rock.
2. Incompetence in office (allowing the personal details including bank details of 25 million people to be lost.
3. A complete lack of trust in this government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
